title: Quick Korean Flavored Barbecue Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Quick Korean Flavored Barbecue Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
12 servings
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
18
ounces
bottled
barbecue sauce
(
1 1/2
cups
), preferably KC Masterpiece
2
tablespoons
soy sauce
2
tablespoons
rice vinegar
1
tablespoon
ssamjang
1
tablespoon
gochujang
1
teaspoon
fish sauce
1/4
teaspoon
sesame oil
Directions
In a medium bowl, whisk together barbecue sauce, soy sauce, vinegar, ssamjang, gochujang, fish sauce, and sesame oil. Use immediately or pour back in bottle and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
